  18. # Run check-typo, comparing only files that have changed since a particular
  19. # git state

  21. ‌check_typo_since() {
  22.   CHECK_TYPO=$(dirname $0)/check-typo
  23.   git diff --name-only $1 \
  24.   | (while IFS= read -r path
  25.   do
  26.     if test -e "$path"; then :; else continue; fi
  27.     $CHECK_TYPO --check-prune "$path" 2>/dev/null
  28.     if test $? -eq 0; then continue; fi
  29.     $CHECK_TYPO "$path"
  30.   done)
  31. }

  33. case $# in
  34.     0) echo "usage: check-typo-since <git reference>"; exit 2;;
  35.     1) check_typo_since $1;;
  36.     *) echo "too many arguments"; exit 2;;
  37. esac
